channel.title: Enter x
channel.description:
should the rs2 feature 'enter x (amount)' be a feature for the server?
Do keep in mind it was not in the version we all played but added into the client in 2009.

item.title: Enter x
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“da real hype, post:16, topic:428947”][quote author=nacional link=topic=531639.msg3885907#msg3885907 date=1326425446]
personally I think it should be added, seriously look at a full high stakes duel video on youtube.
3 minutes of the 5 minute video are the guys putting up the money. Most of the stakes have
a 200k-500k variation inbetween players because they can’t be bother with waiting another
2 minutes to fix it.
[/quote]

lucky for us its f2p (no staking)[/quote]

yeah i know but pointing out jagex’s ridiculous way of setting up some aspects of the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Enter x
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Seems like the decision is split and it’s less work to put it in. Half the people don’t even want it anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Enter x
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

How about someone add it in with a configuration option to turn it on or off? Then it’s an easy decision that can be made later.

Read full topic

yes
- 6 (50%)
no
- 6 (50%)

Looks like half the community are not true rsc players

item.title: Enter x
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“All Day, post:7, topic:428947”]Most of you are over thinking the little things. These updates were place to make a game that hadn’t been updated in years much more efficient.

Add this in.[/quote]The little things are what counts :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Enter x

MoparClassic Council

those little enhancements such as “Offer/Deposit/Withdraw X” make the game only more enjoyable

item.title: Enter x
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

meh I think because jagex didn’t give a shit about rsc after like 2003 we should improve some stuff. Chatting in rsc was/is retarded
not being able to look at chat history while in combat was always a pain.

Read full topic

item.title: Enter x
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:3, topic:428947”][quote author=The Djinn link=topic=531639.msg3884795#msg3884795 date=1326341081]
Well it’s in the Current RSC isn’t it? We’re doing a RSC Replica so I wouldn’t see why we wouldn’t.
[/quote]

Its in the current rsc version because jagex added it to allow rs2 players to be somewhat interested. In rsc people worked for there items and items were more valuable. Every click mattered.

This is f2p and f2p ended in 2004. Lets use the 2004 client… not the 09 update shit. All of us played without enter ‘x’ …why have it now?[/quote]I agree. It was impossible for RSC F2P to have been played with “enter x” shit and the new report abuse menu. If we do get around to eventually adding P2P, maybe we can consider upgrading clients as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Enter x
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

The Djinn:

Well it’s in the Current RSC isn’t it? We’re doing a RSC Replica so I wouldn’t see why we wouldn’t.

Its in the current rsc version because jagex added it to allow rs2 players to be somewhat interested. In rsc people worked for there items and items were more valuable. Every click mattered.

This is f2p and f2p ended in 2004. Lets use the 2004 client… not the 09 update shit. All of us played without enter ‘x’ …why have it now?

Read full topic
